item.title: Sweet Potato Taco Bowls
item.description: These Sweet Potato Taco Bowls are a vibrant and nutritious twist on traditional tacos, perfect for a quick weeknight dinner. Packed with flavor and color, they are sure to delight your taste buds and nourish your body.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 30 minutes

â° Total Time: 45 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 4

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 2 medium sweet potatoes, diced
  • 1 tablespoon olive oil
  • 1 teaspoon chili powder
  • 1 teaspoon cumin
  • Salt and pepper to taste
  • 1 can black beans, drained and rinsed
  • 1 cup corn, frozen or fresh
  • 1 avocado, sliced
  • Fresh cilantro for garnish
  • Lime wedges for serving

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Preheat your oven to 400Â°F (200Â°C).
  2. Toss the diced sweet potatoes with olive oil, chili powder, cumin, salt, and pepper.
  3. Spread the sweet potatoes on a baking sheet and roast for 25-30 minutes, or until tender and slightly caramelized.
  4. In a bowl, combine the black beans and corn, and season with salt and pepper.
  5. Once the sweet potatoes are done, assemble the bowls by layering the roasted sweet potatoes, black bean and corn mixture, and avocado slices.
  6. Garnish with fresh cilantro and serve with lime wedges.

item.title: Sleepy Girl Mocktail
item.description: Indulge in the calming flavors of the Sleepy Girl Mocktail, a delightful drink that combines soothing ingredients to help you unwind. Perfect for any time of day, this refreshing beverage is both delicious and relaxing.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 10 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 0 minutes

â° Total Time: 10 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 2

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 1 cup chamomile tea, brewed and cooled
  • 1/2 cup apple juice
  • 1 tablespoon honey
  • 1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract
  • Ice cubes
  • Fresh mint leaves for garnish

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. In a pitcher, combine the brewed chamomile tea, apple juice, honey, and vanilla extract.
  2. Stir well until the honey is fully dissolved.
  3. Fill glasses with ice cubes and pour the mocktail mixture over the ice.
  4. Garnish with fresh mint leaves and serve immediately.

item.title: Cucumber Salad
item.description: This refreshing cucumber salad is the perfect side dish for any meal, bursting with flavor and crunch. It's quick to prepare, making it an ideal choice for busy weeknights or summer gatherings.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 0 minutes

â° Total Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 4

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 2 large cucumbers, thinly sliced
  • 1/2 red onion, thinly sliced
  • 1/4 cup fresh dill, chopped
  • 1/4 cup white vinegar
  • 2 tablespoons olive oil
  • Salt and pepper to taste

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. In a large bowl, combine the sliced cucumbers, red onion, and dill.
  2. In a separate small bowl, whisk together the white vinegar, olive oil, salt, and pepper.
  3. Pour the dressing over the cucumber mixture and toss to coat evenly.
  4. Let the salad sit for at least 10 minutes before serving to allow the flavors to meld.

item.title: Korean-Inspired Gochujang Caramel Popcorn (Sweet & Spicy!)
item.description: Indulge in the irresistible combination of sweet and spicy with this Korean-inspired gochujang caramel popcorn. Perfect for movie nights or as a unique snack at gatherings, this recipe will elevate your popcorn game to a whole new level!
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 30 minutes

â° Total Time: 45 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 4

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 1 cup popcorn kernels
  • 1 cup sugar
  • 1/4 cup unsalted butter
  • 1/4 cup gochujang
  • 1/2 teaspoon salt

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Pop the popcorn kernels using an air popper or stovetop method and set aside in a large bowl.
  2. In a saucepan, combine sugar, butter, gochujang, and salt over medium heat, stirring until the mixture comes to a boil.
  3. Let the caramel boil for 4-5 minutes without stirring until it turns a deep amber color.
  4. Pour the caramel over the popped popcorn and stir well to coat evenly.
  5. Spread the coated popcorn onto a baking sheet lined with parchment paper and let it cool before serving.

ğŸ“Œ Save this recipe to Pinterest!

item.title: Hot Chocolate Charcuterie Board
item.description: Indulge in the ultimate cozy experience with this Hot Chocolate Charcuterie Board, perfect for gatherings or a sweet night in. With a variety of chocolates, marshmallows, and toppings, it's a delightful treat that everyone will love.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 0 minutes

â° Total Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 6

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 4 cups milk
  • 1 cup heavy cream
  • 1 cup chocolate chips
  • 1 cup mini marshmallows
  • 1/2 cup whipped cream
  • 1/4 cup crushed peppermint
  • 1/4 cup caramel sauce
  • 1/4 cup chocolate sauce
  • 1/4 cup sprinkles
  • 1/4 cup assorted cookies

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. In a saucepan, heat the milk and heavy cream over medium heat until warm.
  2. Add the chocolate chips and stir until melted and smooth.
  3. Pour the hot chocolate into a large serving bowl or pitcher.
  4. Arrange the mini marshmallows, whipped cream, crushed peppermint, caramel sauce, chocolate sauce, sprinkles, and assorted cookies on a large platter.
  5. Serve the hot chocolate with the toppings for guests to customize their drinks.

item.title: DIY Peppermint Mocha
item.description: Indulge in the rich, chocolatey goodness of a homemade peppermint mocha that warms your soul and delights your senses. Perfect for cozy mornings or festive gatherings, this drink is a delightful treat that you can easily whip up at home.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 10 minutes

â° Total Time: 25 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 2

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 2 cups brewed coffee
  • 1 cup milk
  • 2 tablespoons cocoa powder
  • 2 tablespoons sugar
  • 1 teaspoon peppermint extract
  • Whipped cream for topping
  • Chocolate shavings for garnish

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. In a saucepan, combine milk, cocoa powder, and sugar over medium heat, whisking until smooth.
  2. Add brewed coffee and peppermint extract, stirring to combine and heat through.
  3. Pour into mugs and top with whipped cream and chocolate shavings.

item.title: Easy Sausage Balls with Bisquick
item.description: These Easy Sausage Balls with Bisquick are the ultimate party snack that combines savory sausage with a delightful biscuit texture. Perfectly seasoned and incredibly easy to make, they are sure to be a hit at your next gathering!
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 30 minutes

â° Total Time: 45 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 20

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 1 pound sausage, cooked and crumbled
  • 2 cups Bisquick mix
  • 1 cup shredded cheddar cheese
  • 1/2 cup milk
  • 1/4 teaspoon garlic powder
  • 1/4 teaspoon onion powder

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Preheat the oven to 350Â°F (175Â°C).
  2. In a large bowl, combine the cooked sausage, Bisquick mix, cheddar cheese, milk, garlic powder, and onion powder.
  3. Mix until well combined.
  4. Shape the mixture into small balls and place them on a baking sheet.
  5. Bake for 20-25 minutes or until golden brown.

item.title: DIY Peppermint Mocha Latte
item.description: Indulge in the rich flavors of a homemade Peppermint Mocha Latte that combines the warmth of espresso with the refreshing taste of peppermint. Perfect for cozy mornings or a festive treat, this delightful drink is sure to become a seasonal favorite.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 10 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 5 minutes

â° Total Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 2

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 2 cups milk
  • 2 shots espresso or strong coffee
  • 2 tablespoons chocolate syrup
  • 1 tablespoon peppermint syrup
  • Whipped cream for topping
  • Crushed peppermint candies for garnish

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. In a small saucepan, heat the milk over medium heat until steaming but not boiling.
  2. Whisk in the chocolate syrup and peppermint syrup until well combined.
  3. Brew the espresso or strong coffee and pour it into two mugs.
  4. Pour the heated milk mixture over the coffee and stir gently.
  5. Top with whipped cream and sprinkle crushed peppermint candies on top.

item.title: Easy Creamy Chicken Cordon Bleu
item.description: Indulge in the rich flavors of this creamy chicken cordon bleu that combines tender chicken with savory ham and gooey cheese. Perfect for impressing guests or enjoying a cozy night in, this dish is both simple and satisfying.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 30 minutes

â° Total Time: 45 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 4

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Medium

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 4 boneless, skinless chicken breasts
  • 4 slices of ham
  • 4 slices of Swiss cheese
  • 1 cup breadcrumbs
  • 1/2 cup heavy cream
  • 2 tablespoons olive oil
  • Salt and pepper to taste

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Preheat your oven to 375Â°F (190Â°C).
  2. Flatten the chicken breasts to an even thickness using a meat mallet.
  3. Layer each chicken breast with a slice of ham and a slice of cheese.
  4. Roll the chicken tightly and secure with toothpicks.
  5. Dip each chicken roll in heavy cream and then coat with breadcrumbs.
  6. Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat and sear the chicken rolls until golden brown on all sides.
  7. Transfer the chicken to a baking dish and bake for 20 minutes or until cooked through.
  8. Remove toothpicks before serving.

item.title: Cheesy Eyeballs Halloween Skewers
item.description: These playful Cheesy Eyeballs are the perfect spooky addition to your Halloween festivities. With creamy cheese and candy eyes, they transform any platter into a fun and quirky treat that will delight both kids and adults alike!
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 0 minutes

â° Total Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 6

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 1 cup cream cheese
  • 1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese
  • 1/2 cup olives, sliced
  • 1/2 cup candy eyes
  • Skewers

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. In a bowl, mix cream cheese and shredded mozzarella until well combined.
  2. Form the cheese mixture into small balls to resemble eyeballs.
  3. Place a slice of olive in the center of each cheese ball to create the pupil.
  4. Insert candy eyes into the cheese balls for a spooky effect.
  5. Skewer the eyeballs onto sticks for easy serving.

item.title: Cheesy Breadstick Bones
item.description: Get ready to impress your guests with these fun and cheesy Breadstick Bones! Perfect for Halloween, these savory treats are not only easy to make but also pair wonderfully with marinara sauce for dipping.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 27 minutes

â° Total Time: 42 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 10

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 1 pound pizza dough
  • 1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese
  • 1/2 cup marinara sauce for dipping
  • 1 tablespoon olive oil
  • 1 teaspoon garlic powder
  • 1 teaspoon Italian seasoning
  • Flour for dusting

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Preheat the oven to 400Â°F (200Â°C).
  2. On a floured surface, roll out the pizza dough into a rectangle.
  3. Cut the dough into strips about 1 inch wide.
  4. Shape each strip into a bone by twisting and pinching the ends.
  5. Place the shaped breadsticks on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
  6. Brush the breadsticks with olive oil and sprinkle with garlic powder and Italian seasoning.
  7. Bake for 12-15 minutes or until golden brown.
  8. Serve warm with marinara sauce for dipping.

item.title: Spooky Ghost Mac and Cheese
item.description: Transform your classic mac and cheese into a Halloween delight with spooky ghost-shaped mozzarella. This dish is not only fun but also incredibly creamy and comforting, making it perfect for Halloween gatherings or a cozy night in.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 30 minutes

â° Total Time: 45 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 6

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 8 ounces elbow macaroni
  • 2 tablespoons butter
  • 2 tablespoons all-purpose flour
  • 2 cups milk
  • 2 cups shredded cheddar cheese
  • 1 cup mozzarella cheese, cut into ghost shapes
  • Salt and pepper to taste

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Cook macaroni according to package instructions; drain and set aside.
  2. In a large saucepan, melt butter over medium heat. Stir in flour and cook for 1 minute.
  3. Gradually whisk in milk, cooking until thickened. Stir in cheddar cheese until melted.
  4. Combine the cooked macaroni with the cheese sauce, season with salt and pepper.
  5. Transfer to a baking dish, top with ghost-shaped mozzarella, and bake at 350Â°F for 15 minutes until bubbly.

item.title: Halloween Mini Pizzas
item.description: Transform ordinary mini pizzas into adorable Halloween-themed snacks that are perfect for any spooky gathering. These easy treats are not only fun to make but also delicious, making them a hit at Halloween parties!
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 12 minutes

â° Total Time: 27 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 4

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • Mozzarella cheese

  • Olives
  • Tomato sauce
  • Bell peppers

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Preheat the oven to 400Â°F (200Â°C).
  2. Brush mini pizza bases with olive oil.
  3. Spread a layer of tomato sauce on each base.
  4. Decorate with mozzarella cheese to create mummies, olives for spiders, and bell peppers for jack-o'-lanterns.
  5. Bake in the oven for 10-12 minutes until the cheese is melted and bubbly.

item.title: Halloween Pizza Ideas
item.description: Get ready for a spooktacular celebration with these fun Halloween pizza ideas that will delight both kids and adults alike! Each recipe is a creative twist on traditional pizza, making it perfect for your Halloween festivities.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 30 minutes

â° Total Time: 45 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 4

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Medium

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 1 pound pizza dough
  • 1 cup pizza sauce
  • 2 cups shredded mozzarella cheese
  • Black olives for decoration
  • Pepperoni slices
  • Bell peppers for spooky shapes

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Preheat your oven to 475Â°F (245Â°C).
  2. Roll out the pizza dough on a floured surface to your desired thickness.
  3. Spread pizza sauce evenly over the dough.
  4. Sprinkle shredded mozzarella cheese generously on top.
  5. Use black olives and pepperoni to create spooky faces or shapes.
  6. Cut bell peppers into Halloween-themed shapes and place them on the pizza.
  7. Bake in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes or until the crust is golden and cheese is bubbly.

item.title: Crispy Air Fryer Apple Fries
item.description: These Crispy Air Fryer Apple Fries are a delightful twist on a classic treat, combining the sweetness of fresh apples with a crunchy, spiced coating. Perfect for snacking or as a fun dessert, they are sure to please everyone!
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 15 minutes

â° Total Time: 30 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 4

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 4 medium apples, sliced
  • 1 cup breadcrumbs
  • 1 teaspoon cinnamon
  • 1 tablespoon sugar
  • 1 tablespoon olive oil
  • Caramel sauce or vanilla yogurt for dipping

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Preheat the air fryer to 375Â°F (190Â°C).
  2. In a bowl, mix breadcrumbs, cinnamon, and sugar.
  3. Coat apple slices with olive oil, then dip into the breadcrumb mixture until well coated.
  4. Place the coated apple slices in the air fryer basket in a single layer.
  5. Air fry for 10-12 minutes, flipping halfway through, until golden and crispy.
  6. Serve warm with caramel sauce or vanilla yogurt for dipping.

item.title: Crispy Air Fryer Pizza Rolls
item.description: Indulge in the ultimate snack experience with these crispy air fryer pizza rolls! Perfectly golden and bursting with flavor, they offer a satisfying crunch in every delicious bite.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 25 minutes

â° Total Time: 40 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 4

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 1 package pizza dough
  • 1 cup mozzarella cheese, shredded
  • 1/2 cup pepperoni, chopped
  • 1/4 cup pizza sauce
  • 1 tablespoon olive oil
  • 1 teaspoon Italian seasoning

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Preheat the air fryer to 375Â°F (190Â°C).
  2. Roll out the pizza dough and cut it into squares.
  3. Place a small amount of mozzarella cheese, pepperoni, and a dollop of pizza sauce in the center of each square.
  4. Fold the dough over to create a pocket and seal the edges tightly.
  5. Brush the tops with olive oil and sprinkle with Italian seasoning.
  6. Place the rolls in the air fryer basket in a single layer and cook for 10-12 minutes until golden brown.

item.title: Garlic Butter Chicken Bites with Creamy Pasta
item.description: Experience the perfect balance of flavors with these savory garlic butter chicken bites paired with creamy parmesan pasta. This dish is a comforting delight that's perfect for family dinners or meal prep.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 30 minutes

â° Total Time: 45 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 4

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 1 pound chicken breast, cut into bite-sized pieces
  • 2 tablespoons garlic, minced
  • 4 tablespoons butter
  • 1 cup heavy cream
  • 1 cup parmesan cheese, grated
  • Salt and pepper to taste
  • 8 ounces pasta of your choice

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Cook pasta according to package instructions; drain and set aside.
  2. In a large skillet, melt butter over medium heat and add minced garlic.
  3. Add chicken pieces, season with salt and pepper, and cook until golden brown and cooked through, about 5-7 minutes.
  4. Stir in heavy cream and parmesan cheese, cooking until the sauce thickens.
  5. Combine cooked pasta with the chicken and sauce, mixing well to coat.

item.title: Cheesy Pepperoni Roll-Ups
item.description: These Cheesy Pepperoni Roll-Ups are the ultimate quick snack, combining gooey cheese and savory pepperoni wrapped in flaky crescent dough. Perfect for game day or a cozy movie night, they're sure to please everyone!
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 10 minutes

â° Total Time: 25 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 4

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 1 can crescent roll dough
  • 1 cup pepperoni slices
  • 1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Preheat the oven to 375Â°F (190Â°C).
  2. Unroll the crescent roll dough and separate it into triangles.
  3. Place a few pepperoni slices and a sprinkle of cheese on each triangle.
  4. Roll up the dough starting from the wide end to the point.
  5. Place the roll-ups on a baking sheet and bake for 10-12 minutes until golden brown.

item.title: Crescent Roll Pizza Bites
item.description: These Crescent Roll Pizza Bites are the ultimate crowd-pleaser, combining gooey mozzarella, savory pepperoni, and zesty sauce all wrapped in flaky crescents. Perfect for game days or quick snacks, they are easy to make and utterly delicious!
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 15 minutes

â° Total Time: 30 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 8

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 1 can crescent roll dough
  • 1 cup mozzarella cheese, shredded
  • 1 cup pepperoni slices
  • 1/2 cup pizza sauce

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Preheat the oven to 375Â°F (190Â°C).
  2. Unroll the crescent roll dough and separate it into triangles.
  3. Place a slice of pepperoni and a tablespoon of mozzarella cheese on each triangle.
  4. Roll up the dough starting from the wide end, enclosing the filling.
  5. Place the rolled bites on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
  6. Bake for 12-15 minutes or until golden brown.
  7. Serve warm with pizza sauce for dipping.

item.title: Pad Thai
item.description: Experience the vibrant flavors of Thailand with this classic Pad Thai recipe. It's a delightful stir-fry that combines tender rice noodles, succulent shrimp, and a medley of fresh ingredients, all tossed in a savory tamarind sauce that will transport your taste buds straight to the streets of Bangkok.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 15 minutes

â° Total Time: 30 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 4

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Medium

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 8 oz rice noodles
  • 8 oz shrimp or chicken
  • 2 eggs
  • 1 cup bean sprouts
  • 1/4 cup peanuts, crushed
  • 1 lime, cut into wedges
  • 2 tablespoons tamarind paste
  • 2 tablespoons fish sauce
  • 1 tablespoon sugar
  • 2 cloves garlic, minced
  • 2 shallots, sliced

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Soak rice noodles in warm water for 20 minutes until soft.
  2. In a large skillet or wok, stir-fry shrimp or chicken with minced garlic over medium-high heat until cooked through.
  3. Push the protein to one side of the pan, crack in the eggs, and scramble until just set.
  4. Add the soaked noodles to the skillet along with tamarind paste, fish sauce, and sugar; toss everything together until well combined.
  5. Stir in bean sprouts and cook for an additional minute.
  6. Serve hot, garnished with crushed peanuts and lime wedges.
